solution_line_template: If the first bowl has a capacity of {first_bowl_capacity_fraction} of the second bowl, it's holding {first_bowl_capacity_fraction} * {second_bowl_marbles} = <<{first_bowl_capacity_fraction}*{second_bowl_marbles}={first_bowl_marbles}>>{first_bowl_marbles} marbles
Together, the two bowls are holding {first_bowl_marbles} + {second_bowl_marbles} = <<{first_bowl_marbles}+{second_bowl_marbles}={total_marbles}>>{total_marbles} marbles
